article_html: Armed police interrupt a conference on depicting the prophet Muhammad after shots were fired outside the venue in Garland, Texas. An officer steps onto the stage at the Curtis Culwell Center to warn participants that a police officer and two suspects have been shot outside the building and that it's possible they have explosives on them. The authorities then evacuate the 200 participants at the event and seal off large areas including a nearby shopping mall
text: Armed police interrupt a conference on depicting the prophet Muhammad after shots were fired outside the venue in Garland, Texas. An officer steps onto the stage at the Curtis Culwell Center to warn participants that a police officer and two suspects have been shot outside the building and that it's possible they have explosives on them. The authorities then evacuate the 200 participants at the event and seal off large areas including a nearby shopping mall
title: Armed police put Muhammad art exhibition in Texas on lockdown - video
